name: MeasureReport.improvementNotation
title: MeasureReport.improvementNotation
purpose: Data Elements are defined for each element to assist in questionnaire construction etc

element.definition: Whether improvement in the measure is noted by an increase or decrease in the measure score.
element.comment: This element is typically defined by the measure, but reproduced here to ensure the measure score can be interpreted. The element is labeled as a modifier because it changes the interpretation of the reported measure score.
element.isModifierReason: Improvement notation determines how to interpret the measure score (i.e. whether an increase is an improvement)

extension.valueString: Observation values that indicate what change in a measurement value or score is indicative of an improvement in the measured item or scored issue.

binding.description: The improvement notation of the measure report (e.g. increase or decrease)
